item.description:
My house again: the Idle Dog, 15 Glendale Street, Maynard, MA 01754. 978-973-7855. Deb Muise. 1pm till whenever.

Daphne the puppy is still really cute, so if you missed last month's meeting, you're still in luck. This time, Susan and Tom will provide delectable goodies, and the theme is vaguely associated with the Ides of March. All contributions are welcome. Excess snacks are donated to the Maynard Food Bank. Cash donations help with the $20/month membership fee and other expenses.

See you then!
item.how_to_find_us: There's a new sign for the front of the house. Check my website for directions: www.theidledog.com
item.why: The food can be great, The company is friendly, and the dogs are wicked cute.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs March Meeting
